description.value:
A subtle monocole that can either be a Motion Predictor, Photo Sight, Preysense Sight, or Telescopic Sight (determined when acquired). Requires -30 Scrutiny Test to notice monocole is special. Must be linked to weapon (such as via vox connection) and counts as weapon's sight.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: -
